OOC(Since Firearm had called the Cybertron Fire for a stretcher and 
such, I thought they were very close to the ship.)

::Spears::
She turned and heard the noise of the jetpack getting closer.  She 
kept running. Her trainer program was still in charge. She turned her 
head and shot a wide optic lazar shot at Firearm, missing him by a 
few feet. "I don't want to be hacked into. Leave me alone."

She opened up her comlink. "MASTER PREBON! HELP! THE MAXIMALS ARE 
TRYING TO KILL ME!"

She stopped and turned, facing Firearm and fired her optic lazars 
again at him.  But she still misses him by a few feet.  Her maximal 
program wouldn't allow her to hurt another maximal.  But her trainer 
program still tried.  She fired again, missing him. She cursed under 
her breath, turned and kept running.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Uh, Spears and co. were still at the Ark, wern't they?
> 
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm growls as Spears runs off, hearing her yell.
> 
> "Let's go!" he says to Lunarpine, taking off and flying at Spears, 
his 
> jetpack pushing him forward as he slowly gainst on her. He sets his 
arm 
> cannon on charge launcher, ready to blast the ground near her if 
needed.
